name: panic-overlay
description: Displays JS errors in browsers. Shows sources. Opens locations in VS Code. Framework agnostic.

scripts.demo-no-bundler: cp build/panic-overlay.browser.js demo/no-bundler && cd demo/no-bundler && npx live-server
scripts.demo-parcel-vanilla: rm -rf .parcel-cache && cd demo/parcel-vanilla && rm -rf dist && parcel index.html
scripts.demo-parcel-vanilla-async: rm -rf .parcel-cache && cd demo/parcel-vanilla-async && rm -rf dist && parcel index.html
scripts.demo-parcel-react: rm -rf .parcel-cache && cd demo/parcel-react && rm -rf dist && parcel index.html
scripts.demo-snowpack-vanilla: cd demo/snowpack-vanilla && npm i && snowpack dev
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run browserify

author: Vitaly Gordon <rocket.mind@gmail.com>
